item.title: Fear the Corporate Gestapos
item.description: Me and my friends often joke that we’re in a bit of nationality, if not identity crisis. Many of us are from Chinese families, born into Thailand, with morality shaped by weekend Japanese cartoons and with our brains quite Hollywoodized. Sometimes we can’t even tell what motives are driving us to believe and behave in a certain way. It’s kinda a conversation guaranteed to come up a booze and weed smoking party.
